Title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
Writer: Hideyuki Kikuchi (novel), Yoshiaki Kawajiri (screenplay), Ellen Moore (adaptation), Jack Fletcher (adaptation)
Actors: Andrew Philpot, John Rafter Lee, Pamela Adlon, Wendee Lee
Plot: When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.
Production: Vampire Hunter D Prod. Committee, BMG Funhouse, Softcapital, Goodhill Vision
